Translations.Text: Mina Al-Mu'uminina Rijalun Sadaqu Ma `Ahadu Allaha `Alayhi Faminhum Man Qađa Nahbahu Wa Minhum Man Yantaziru Wa Ma Baddalu Tabdilaan
Liyajziya Allahu As-Sadiqina Bisidqihim Wa Yu`adhiba Al-Munafiqina 'In Sha'a 'Aw Yatuba `Alayhim 'Inna Allaha Kana Ghafuraan Rahimaan
Waradda Allahu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bighayzihim Lam Yanalu Khayraan Wa Kafa Allahu Al-Mu'uminina Al-Qitala Wa Kana Allahu Qawiyaan `Azizaan
Wa 'Anzala Al-Ladhina Zaharuhum Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Min Sayasihim Wa Qadhafa Fi Qulubihimu Ar-Ru`ba Fariqaan Taqtuluna Wa Ta'siruna Fariqaan
Wa 'Awrathakum 'Arđahum Wa Diyarahum Wa 'Amwalahum Wa 'Arđaan Lam Tata'uha Wa Kana Allahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadiraan
Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nabiyu Qul Li'zwajika 'In Kuntunna Turidna Al-Haya Ata Ad-Dunya Wa Zinataha Fata`alayna 'Umatti`kunna Wa 'Usarrihkunna Sarahaan Jamilaan
Wa 'In Kuntunna Turidna Allaha Wa Rasulahu Wa Ad-Dara Al-'Akhirata Fa'inna Allaha 'A`adda Lilmuhsinati Minkunna 'Ajraan `Azimaan
Ya Nisa'a An-Nabiyi Man Ya'ti Minkunna Bifahishatin Mubayyinatin Yuđa`af Laha Al-`Adhabu Đi`fayni Wa Kana Dhalika `Ala Allahi Yasiraan
